snippet: Joshua DuBois, the young Pentecostal minister who has led President Obama’s Office on Faith-Based and Neighborhood Partnerships, is leaving, Mr. Obama said Thursday.
abstract: Pres Obama announces that Joshua DuBois, Pentecostal minister who has led White House Office on Faith-Based and Neighborhood Partnerships, is leaving to teach at New York University.
lead_paragraph: Joshua DuBois, the young Pentecostal minister who has led President Obama’s Office on Faith-Based and Neighborhood Partnerships, is leaving, Mr. Obama said Thursday.

headline.seo: White House Director of Faith-Based Initiatives Will Step Down
headline.main: White House Director of Faith-Based Office Is Leaving His Post
headline.print_headline: White House Director Of Faith-Based Office Is Leaving His Post
